projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce solution built with React and TailwindCSS

details.title: Overview
details.content: A full-featured e-commerce platform with modern UI/UX principles and robust functionality.

details.title: Features
details.content: Product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, order management, and admin dashboard.

details.title: Technical Details
details.content: Built with React and TypeScript, utilizing Redux for state management and Node.js for the backend.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Streamlined task management with real-time updates

details.title: Overview
details.content: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.

details.title: Features
details.content: Task creation, assignment, due dates, comments, and team collaboration tools.

details.title: Technical Details
details.content: Implemented with React and Firebase for real-time functionality and data persistence.

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: Dynamic portfolio creation tool for developers

details.title: Overview
details.content: A tool that helps developers create and maintain professional portfolio websites.

details.title: Features
details.content: Custom themes, project showcases, skill highlighting, and contact form integration.

details.title: Technical Details
details.content: Full-stack application using the MERN stack with custom theming engine.
